name: Challenge Coin
description: A heavy coin made of gold. Redeem for a free draft.

name: Silver Challenge Coin
description: No current use. Can be safely disposed of.

name: Bronze Challenge Coin
description: No current use. Can be safely disposed of.

name: Sir Donovan's Amulet
description: A talisman for remotely contacting your employer

dialogOnUse.text: The amulet lies inert until mana is channeled through it.

options.name: Contact Sir Donovan (Requires 3 Mana Shards)
options.text: Unsure exactly what to expect, you channel a bit of energy from your own mana shards into the amulet. It glows an array of colors for the briefest of moments and then fades.

options.name: (Continue)
options.text: A thought enters your mind in response, not so much words as an urge - you should go to a town.

options.name: Contact Sir Donovan (Requires 5 Mana Shards)
options.text: You funnel the power of your mana shards into the artifact. It takes using a few more of them before the device reacts this time, but eventually it glows in multiple colors once again.
